subject: Release of advertisement for tender notices of pre-construction activities
text: HRd4 <715r ToTHr wrfarrut PHONE 91-11-5074100/5074200 Fax 91-11-5080360/ 508046C (Hev; 4ar7 M7 TTTArf TAT4) Extn 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, SECTOR-10, DWARKA NEW DELHI-110045 No.11041/21/2002-Admn.III 26"h August 2002 POLICY MATTERS ADMNISTRATIONIFINANCE (16/2002) [Decision taken on CGM (T) Division's File No.NHAI/11014/5(492001rTech/GM(E.III)} RELEASE OF ADVERTISEMENT FOR TENDER NOTICES OF PRE-CONSTRUCTION ACTIITIES In connection with various pre-construction activities like shifting of HTILT power lines, cutting f road side trees_ land acquisition, shifting of utilities etc. tender notifications are required to be published in local newspapers. Since time is severe constraint for the completion of most of these activities, the respective Project Directors are hereby authorised to issue the advertisements for works regarding pre-construction activities to be published in one English and one regional newspaper at DAVP rates_ For works costing more than one crore, the advertisements may also be put on NHAI Website  This issues with the approval of Chairman: Cealltay (S. Loganathan) General Manager (Admh.) To: AII PIUs/CMUs Copy to: PS to Chairman AIl Members/CGMsICVO Atl GMs/DGMs/Managers Hindi OfficerILibrarian A+A+ Sq
